page.title: 20 HOLIDAYS
page.content: Most of the second year pupils in the groups questioned had a family holiday in 1984. Only 12 families had not and two of these said that they usually went on holiday but did not last year. Of the 32 pupils who gave details of where their family had gone,7 had gone abroad and 5 had gone to Wales. Overseas destinations included Spain,Italy,the South of France, Belgium,Portugal and Ireland. Other places mentioned included Devon,Cornwall,Norfolk,Bournemouth, Margate,Rhyl,Lowestoft and the Isle of Man.
